Instruction:
Chosen step: "Using your hands, squeeze the dough through your fingers until it is smooth and sticky."

Reworded step: "Using your hands, work on the dough until it reaches a smooth and sticky consistency."

Prepare the goro iron by greasing lightly. Roll out the dough on a floured surface to about 1/8 inch thickness, then cut it into circles to match the goro iron size using a paper pattern. Cook the circles on the heated iron, flipping once until golden. After removing from the iron, cut into thirds while still warm.
